content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mary Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Heinrich Heine, and I'm open to discussing the rental price for this apartment. Please make me an offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. Based on my budget and the size of the apartment, I'd like to offer 600 Euro per month. Is this within your acceptable range?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euro per month is not within my acceptable range. I'm looking to maximize the rent for this apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mr. Heine. I'm also flexible with my offer. How about 650 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment. Is this more acceptable to you?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: 650 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but I'm still seeking a higher rent. Would you be willing to go up to 700 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
